title: Pepperdine Family Camp 2016: Week 1
desc: Please visit our website --   -- for more information on this great family experience. ?Call us at 310.506.6602 or email  .  Cancellation requests must be made in writing preferably through email. Email  . The cancellation policy applies to both individual and family cancellations.  If you wish to modify your existing registration, contact us for assistance.  Full payment is due at time of registration unless you are enrolled in a payment plan.?  Monthly payment plans are available by request until April 15, 2016. A deposit of 25% will be required at the time of registration. Monthly payments must be provided separately as we can NOT recharge the credit card you use for your initial payment. Contact us to set up your payment plan. We look forward to seeing you next summer in Malibu!
